title: Doc (OTOMS)
description: Doc is a machine for managing traffic fines that has a vulnerability in the assignment of permissions to commands and LFI in profile editing..

title: Vulnversity
description: Vulnversity is a machine with a miss config. That allows reverse shell and remote code execution using php, the programming language.

title: Blue
description: Blue is a machine with a vulnerability in the SMB 445 protocol, which allows remote code execution and was discovered in security bulletin MS17-010.
